column1: Uchi////Very mixed feelings about this place. I had heard rave reviews from friends so made reservations a month in advance for a birthday; the only time available was 9pm on a Sat night. Complimentary valet parking was convenient
column3: we were told the previous party was still dining. The place was packed with little space to wait at the wine bar or outdoor patio. We were finally seated around 9:40. The manager did give us a complimentary appetizer to start.
